name: War of Stealth: Assassin
overview: This is a stealth action, top-down shooter with armed soldiers and zombies which has a sci fi style and rude and rectilinear humor. You play as a soldier who enters a secret base to get information about the work that goes on there. The main hero doesn`t expect the base to have so many blood-chilling secrets. The game gives thrills with the possibility to play quiet and stealthy but you can also shoot if you are ready for it.
